line.text: %Forge%: Be careful in this area. I've just detected that someone's activated the Genoshan Automated Defensive system. Reconnaissance drones are going to be painting moving targets for tactical missile strikes. So if you see a beam of light, keep away from it.

response.text: %PLAYER%: Any idea how the system was turned on?

line.text: %Forge%: It had to have been deliberate. Someone reset the communication dish for the system.

response.text: %PLAYER%: So if we can find the communication dish we can deactivate the defensive system?

line.text: %Forge%: Yes. Keep an eye out for it - a piece of equipment like that shouldn't be hard to find.
